scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:tsc && npm run build:api-extractor
scripts.build:coverage: node ../scripts/rm.js dist/lib && node -r @agnos-ui/code-coverage/interceptReadFile ../node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.lib.json && node ../scripts/buildPackageJson.js lib dist/lib
scripts.build:lib: node ../scripts/rm.js dist/lib && tsc -p tsconfig.lib.json && node ../scripts/buildPackageJson.js lib dist/lib
